products.name: Plain Burger
products.description: One 100% Irish beef patty, lettuce, onion and tomato, topped with ketchup on a plain bun. Burger served with chips.

products.name: Cheeseburger
products.description: Two 100% Irish beef patties, two slices of cheddar cheese, melted blue cheese, lettuce, onion and pickles on a sesame seed bun. Burger served with chips.

products.name: Quarter Pounder
products.description: A quarter-pound patty of 100% Irish beef, with a slice of cheddar cheese, onions, pickles, mustard and a dollop of tomato ketchup in a sesame seed bun. Irresistible! Burger served with chips.

products.name: Monster
products.description: Our signature burger comes with three 100% Irish beef patties, streaky bacon, a slice of cheddar cheese, lettuce, onion and pickles, all on a large sesame seed bun drenched in our special Mood For Food mayo. Burger served with chips.

products.name: Berry Delicious
products.description: Summer has arrived! Made of raspberries, blackberries and strawberries for a berry tasty boost!

products.name: Green Paradise
products.description: Made of mint, ginger and kiwi, this delicious drink is going take you to heaven!

products.name: Vanilla Ice
products.description: Made of vanilla, Oreo biscuits and a secret ingredient, our vanilla smoothie is anything but boring!

products.name: Coke Can - 350ml
products.description: In the mood of an ice-cold Coke? Of course! Well, what are you waiting for?!

products.name: Brownie
products.description: This delicious brownie is made using the finest of the chocolate there is.

products.name: Apple Pie
products.description: Baked with fresh apples, this apple pie is going to make your mouth water.

products.name: Tabule
products.description: Traditional salad made of bulgur, tomato, and finely chopped parsley and mint,  including onion and garlic, seasoned with olive oil, lemon juice and salt.

products.name: Falafel Sandwich
products.description: Sandwich with freshly cooked falafels, one of our most popular dishes.

products.name: Ramen
products.description: A delicious and very popular soup containing noodles, Irish pork, chopped spring onions, boiled egg and spices

products.name: Spring Rolls
products.description: 4 vegetable spring rolls for a tasty snack and a good vegetarian option.

products.name: Tandoori Chicken
products.description: Tandoori chicken is a South Asian dish of chicken marinated in yogurt and spices and roasted in a tandoor, a cylindrical clay oven.

products.name: Diablo
products.description: Devilishly tasty! This pizza comes with mozzarella, spicy tomato purée, pepperoni, red onion and hot Jalapeños.

products.name: Quattro formaggi
products.description: Cheesy in a good way, this pizza comes with blue cheese, mature cheddar, emmental and pecorino, all deliciously melted together.

products.name: Chicken Heaven
products.description: This pizza will give you wings! Chicken strips on a bed of mozzarella, mushrooms, chopped peppers and tomato purée.

products.name: Meaty
products.description: This belly-busting pizza comes with pepperoni, bacon, chorizo and steak pieces, all on a bed on mozzarella and tomato purée.

products.name: Bolognese
products.description: Four 100% Irish beef patties, a slice of cheese, lettuce, onion and pickles. And the sauce, the special Mood For Food mayo. Burger comes with chips.

products.name: Carbonara
products.description: Four 100% Irish beef patties, a slice of cheese, lettuce, onion and pickles. And the sauce, the special Mood For Food mayo. Burger comes with chips.

products.name: Green Pesto
products.description: A quarter-pound patty of 100% Irish beef, with two slices of cheese, onions, pickles, mustard and a dollop of tomato ketchup in a sesame seed bun. Irresistible. Burger comes with chips.
